name: High School Unsimulation
description:
Are you stressed out of your mind??? Do you like visual novels??? Do you like visual novels about being stressed out of your mind???

Welcome to

High School Unsimulation

!!!

High School Unsimulation is a mental health advice game in the style of a visual novel. It features cute characters, straightforward life tips, and emotional response strategies. As the title suggests, it will be most helpful for high schoolers, but it features relaxing guides that can benefit practically anyone.

Routes:

Hannah - cheery, upbeat, and always ready to help a friend

Sable - melancholy, reflective, and ethereal

Alexis - energetic, straightforward, and sporty

Walker - friendly, insightful, and realistic

Credits:

Script - Lacole  (@lunarlichen)

Art - Lacole (@lunarlichen)

Voice - Lacole (@lunarlichen)

Programming - @lettertea on GitHub

Background Photos - @krisatomic, @spacejoy, @thomholmes, @itfeelslikefilm on Unsplash

UI - Lacole (@lunarlichen)

Due to the technicalities of formatting, the download is not the game itself, but rather a document that contains the link to the game. High School Unsimulation can also be accessed by clicking here: https://highschool-unsimulation.vercel.app/.

High School Unsimulation's twitter: https://twitter.com/HSUnsimulator.
